existing_features.title: Update the sidebar navigation item “boxes” (all sidebar buttons/links such as Dashboard, Contracts, Admin Panel, Contact Support, Sign Out) so they render as clearly filled-in, solid-color buttons with improved visual polish (stronger background fill, clear borders, and consistent hover/active states) in both light and dark mode, on both desktop sidebar and the mobile sidebar sheet.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update sidebar box styling to be filled with color and improve overall visual appeal
